alert.note: Alert for Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 13 at 2:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Custer and northwestern Oglala Lakota Counties through 315 PM MDT... At 231 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Fairburn, or 19 miles east of Custer, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fairburn and southeastern Custer State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM MDT for southwestern South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Custer Co Plains; Hermosa Foot Hills; Oglala Lakota
